column5: Apologize for posting this here...am sure there's a "how to" somewhere but i can't find it.  Every time i try to post a pic I get an error message saying that the image extension isn't allowed on this board.  Have tried imageshack and tinypic. Anyone....?
cram, get a Photobucket account then it's just a matter of uploading your pics to it and copying the image code into your new post Leechman
YOu're a good man. Thanks.  btw - love the spinnerbaits.  Curious - any idea why imageshak or tinypic don't work??? Should be same as photobucket.

May not be where you load and link from at all... if you name your pictures with any blank spacing.. it gives them a file name with the % sign in it and OFC won't take them as it thinks they're dynamic links. Be sure when you name your pics like so... cramwalleye1
Thanks cram!!!  Not sure why these sites don't work     It's a lot easier with Photobucket
